sen.e: Imperial Prince Tamehira (952 - December 15, 1010) was the Imperial family in Heian period and Emperor Murakami's fourth Prince.

sen.j: 村上天皇は為平親王を愛し、その婚礼には自分が安子と婚礼した際の例に倣って宮中の昭陽舎で実施させるなど、将来の皇位継承候補としての待遇を受けている。
sen.e: Emperor Murakami loved Imperial Prince Tamehira, he let the Prince follow his example of having Prince's wedding at Shoyosya of the Imperial Palace where the Emperor had his own wedding with Anshi (Yasuko), the Prince was treated as the future successor for the Imperial throne.

sen.j: 村上天皇は安子の実家である九条流と賜姓皇族の筆頭である高明を為平親王の後見とする事で将来の安泰を図ったと考えられている。
sen.e: It is presumed that the Emperor Murakami tried to secure the future by letting Takaakira as Imperial Prince Tamehira's supervisor, while Takaakira was the the first on the list between the Kujo family where Anshi (Yasuko) was born from, and Shisei Imperial family (Imperial family who were given the surname and made demotion from nobility to subject)

sen.j: 翌年、村上天皇崩御に伴い、親王の兄である冷泉天皇が即位するが、天皇は、容姿は美しいが奇行が目立ち病弱であった為藤原実頼が関白（准摂政）を務めていたが、聡明な為平親王がその皇太弟になると予想されていた。
sen.e: After Emperor Murakami died on the following year, Emperor Reizei succeeded to the throne however the Emperor Reizei had many eccentricities and born weak although he was attractive outlook, when FUJIWARA no Saneyori was the Chancellor (associate regent) and the Imperial Prince Tamehira, who was bright, was expected to become Crown Prince.

sen.j: 高明は親王が即位する事で外戚になれることからその立太子が期待されたが、実際には守平親王（後の円融天皇）が皇太弟となった。
sen.e: Takaakira wished the Imperial Prince to become Crown Prince since he could become his maternal relative, in fact, Imperial Prince Morihira (later called Emperor Enyu) became Crown Prince.

sen.j: これは為平親王の外戚で既に一上の地位を得ていた高明が更なる権力を得ることに対する藤原氏側の危惧があったとされている。
sen.e: This was (the reason why the Imperial Prince Tamehira did not become Crown Prince) presumed that the Fujiwara clan concerned about Takaakira to have more political power who himself already was the maternal relative to the Imperial Prince Tamehira and had a certain position in the Imperial Palace.

sen.e: During this time Anshi (Yasuko) and Aihime (Anshi's younger sister and MINAMOTO no Takaakira's Empress) were both passed away, although the Kujo family tried to exclude Takaakira and the Imperial Prince Tamehira from their poison, they changed their attitude later on.

sen.j: 985年、王女の婉子女王が花山天皇に14歳で入内し女御となるが、天皇は僅か6ヶ月後に出家する。
sen.e: In 985 the Princess Enshi (Tsuyako) made Emperor Kazan's Imperial consort's bridal entry into the court when she was fourteen years old, and she became Nyogo (a high ranking lady in the court), however the Emperor entered into the priesthood just after six months from this.
